mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(userId, password, email, name, nickname, birth) VALUES(#{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{birth})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT userId FROM users WHERE userId = #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, birth = #{birth}, filePath = #{filePath}, fileName = #{fileName} WHERE userId = #{userId}
